title: Global Problem | Mr. Fit | with Mark A. Cinelli
text:
 According to the WHO, 2/3 of worldwide diseases will be related to lifestyle by 2020
 60% (range 43.3% to 99%) of people throughout the world get inadequate exercise per the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) and ACSM recommendations of at least 150 minutes per week.
 80% of chronic disease can be prevented with healthy behavioral choices, per the European Prospective Investigation (2009)
 < 50% of PCPs provide guidance on weight loss & weight maintenance, physical activity or exercise, and nutrition.
*CDC National Center for Health Statistics, 2012
Stay Active, Stay Fit!
